title: The Biggest Health Care Reform in a Decade Could Lower Your Costs
description: Larry Levitt writes about the political and practical impact of the health care provisions in the Inflation Reduction Act  in The New York Times guest essay, “The Biggest Health Care Reform in a Decade Could Lower Your Costs.”
